about_the_game:
Forge your own unique team of characters and dive into a journey to redeem yourselves - and the entire world - from an evil within...

Experience the first full-length JRPG from the one-man development team Dunamis Games!

⚔️ Features ⚔️
★ A main story with over 10 hours of content
★ Every game is different! Choose your team from 8 different character classes, from the Blacksmith to the Wizard.
★ Over 130 enemies spread across various locations, from dry desert and barren mountains to lush forests and deep caves
★ Travel by land, sea, or air across the vast world of Concordia
★ When you're done with the main story, discover side quests and dungeons to continue your adventure!
★ Fight the world's most difficult bosses in the Monster Arena
★ Featuring Music by Matthew Pablo

Do you have what it takes? Begin your adventure and find out!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: SteamOS 2, Debian 8, Ubuntu 16.04, CentOS/RHEL 7
  • Processor: 4th Gen Intel i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Must support OpenGL 3.0 or higher
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: If the included Debian executable does not run, please use EternalConcord.sh provided.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: SteamOS 2, Debian 8, Ubuntu 19.04, CentOS/RHEL 7
  • Processor: 4th Gen Intel i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Must support OpenGL 3.0 or higher
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: If the included Debian executable does not run, please use EternalConcord.sh provided.
